entry.title: First Alpha Release
entry.summary: Hello welcome everyone to the first blog post and also our first Alpha release.
entry.content:
Hello welcome everyone to the first blog post and also our first Alpha release.

The release can be found in this link

The set of features this contains is:

  • Support for github Actions
  • Notifications
  • Global state as a tray icon
  • Individual build states in the menu of the tray icon.

We hope you enjoy and we look forward to your feedback and help in our repository
